title: Craters Of The Moon National Monument & Preserve: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Bring Craters to your classroom. Many of the activities stand alone. Others can be utilized to help prepare for a field trip or review what students learned on their visit.  All Curriculum Materials   curriculum    Liquid Rock Learn More     Field Trips Bring your students to Craters. Discover resources for planning, reserving and leading an educational excursion to the park.   All Field Trips   Field Trip    Fall and Spring Field Trips Learn More
